location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Norris, Deputy Military Paymaster-General at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Charles Norris, Deputy Military Paymaster-General at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting an extract of retrenchment from the Garrison Pay Office in August 1813 (extract not attached).
